typeProperties.script:
parameters{
	run_id as string (''),
	adf_name as string ('')
}
source(output(
		row as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	documentForm: 'documentPerLine') ~> ADFCONTROL
ADFCONTROL derive(ADF_RUN_ID = $run_id,
		ADF_TIME_STMP = currentDate()-1,
		ADF_JOB_NAME = $adf_name) ~> AddADFDetails
AddADFDetails alterRow(updateIf(ADF_JOB_NAME==$adf_name)) ~> AlterRow
AlterRow sink(input(
		ADF_RUN_ID as string,
		ADF_JOB_NAME as string,
		ADF_SUC_TS as date
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:true,
	upsertable:false,
	keys:['ADF_JOB_NAME'],
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		ADF_RUN_ID,
		ADF_JOB_NAME,
		ADF_SUC_TS = ADF_TIME_STMP
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> Write

parameters{
	job_name as string ('')
}
source(output(
		ADF_RUN_ID as string,
		ADF_JOB_NAME as string,
		ADF_SUC_TS as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> GetControls
ResetDate alterRow(updateIf(ADF_JOB_NAME==$job_name)) ~> AlterRow
GetControls filter(ADF_JOB_NAME == $job_name) ~> FilterJob
FilterJob derive(Date = '1899-01-01 00:00:00.000',
		id = '') ~> ResetDate
AlterRow sink(input(
		ADF_RUN_ID as string,
		ADF_JOB_NAME as string,
		ADF_SUC_TS as date
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:false,
	updateable:true,
	upsertable:false,
	keys:['ADF_JOB_NAME'],
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		ADF_RUN_ID = id,
		ADF_JOB_NAME,
		ADF_SUC_TS = Date
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> WriteResetDate
